snippet: Police have arrested six teenage boys in connection with the murder of a man who was fatally shot in the driveway of his home, the authorities said.
abstract: Six teenage boys are arrested in connection with murder of Steve Gerecke in Albuquerque, NM, who had tried to stop youths as they were breaking into cars and homes in his neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Police have arrested six teenage boys in connection with the murder of a man who was fatally shot in the driveway of his home, the authorities said.

headline.main: New Mexico: 6 Teenagers Held in Killing After Thefts
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: 6 Teenagers Held in Killing After Thefts
